filing_report_identifier.title: Select Report by Entity Name
filing_report_identifier.definition: Type the entity name to get a list of matching companies taxonomies to search on.
filing_report_identifier.__comment__: Parameter is included in rest path

filing_taxonomy_identifier.title: or Select DTS by Entity Name
filing_taxonomy_identifier.definition: Type the entity name to get a list of matching companies taxonomies to search on.
filing_taxonomy_identifier.__comment__: Parameter is included in rest path

entity_name.title: or Get Facts by Entity Name
entity_name.definition: Type the entity name to get a list of matching companies to search on.

select_cik.title: Get Facts by Entity CIK
select_cik.definition: Type the entity CIK identifier to search for. This can be a comma separated list.
select_cik.__comment__: Any value here should be added to a comma separated list from Entity Name parameter above.

sic_code.title: or Get Facts by SIC Code (SEC list)
sic_code.definition: Select the fiscal periods to search on. This can be a combination of values.

year.title: Filter by Fiscal Year
year.definition: Type the fiscal year to search for.

period.title: Filter by Period
period.definition: Select the fiscal periods to search on. This can be a combination of values.

concept_name.title: Filter by Concept Name
concept_name.definition: Type the concept name to search for. This can be a comma separated list.

fact_ultimus.title: Get Latest Facts
fact_ultimus.definition: Select true to see the latest values reported and ignore duplicate values reported in prior periods.
fact_ultimus.__comment__: If value is null then do not pass parameter, null will appear as a blank in all cases

fact_has-dimensions.title: Get Facts with Dimensions
fact_has-dimensions.definition: Select true to see those facts with dimensions.
fact_has-dimensions.__comment__: If value is null then do not pass parameter, null will appear as a blank in all cases

limit.title: Data Limit
limit.definition: This is the limit for the results to return.

offset.title: Data Offset
offset.definition: This is the offset of the results .

Fields.title: Fields to Return
Fields.definition: Enter the data fields to return.

entity_name.definition: Type the entity name to search for.

select_cik.title: Select by Entity CIK
select_cik.definition: Type the entity CIK identifier to search for. This can be a comma separated list.
select_cik.__comment__: Any value here should be added to a comma separated list from Entity Name parameter above.

select_ticker.title: Select by Entity Ticker
select_ticker.definition: Type the entity ticker identifier to search for. This can be a comma separated list.
select_ticker.__comment__: Any value here should be added to a comma separated list.

limit.definition: This is the limit for the results to return.

offset.title: Data Offset
offset.definition: This is the offset of the results .

filing_taxonomy_identifier.definition: Type the entity name to get a list of matching companies taxonomies to search on.
filing_taxonomy_identifier.__comment__: Parameter is included in rest path

base_taxonomy_identifier.title: or Select Base Taxonomy Year (eg. 2020)
base_taxonomy_identifier.definition: Type the base taxonomy name to get a list of matching taxonomies to search on.
base_taxonomy_identifier.__comment__: Parameter is included in rest path

label_text.title: Search by Label Text
label_text.definition: Type the label to search for.

concept_name.definition: Type the concept name to search for. This can be a comma separated list.

filing_taxonomy_identifier.definition: Type the entity name to get a list of matching companies taxonomies to search on.

string_match.title: Select Description Search type
string_match.definition: Enables simple text search functionality with the network.role-description parameter on the relationship object. Use the like switch to find the exact phrase and the ts switch to find phrases containing the word.

role_description.title: Filter by Role Description (eg. Balance Sheet)
role_description.definition: Type the role description to search for eg. Balance Sheet.

network_type.title: Select Network Type
network_type.definition: Type the network type to get the matching network types.

arcrole-uri.title: Select Arcrole Type
arcrole-uri.definition: Type the arcrole to get the specific relationship types.

accession_number.title: Filter by filing Number (eg. 0000008868-20-000025)
accession_number.definition: Type the accession_number to search for specific filings eg. 0000008868-20-000025. This can be a comma separated list.

assertion_code.title: Filter by Assertion Code (eg. DQC.US.0001.62)
assertion_code.definition: Type the assertion code to search for eg. DQC.US.0001.62. This can be a comma separated list.

assertion_source.title: Error Source
assertion_source.definition: Select the source to view errors from xbrl-us rules, DQC rules or EFM related errors.
